CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Reservataire',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Referencement'), ISPICKVAL( LPCR_TypeFacturation__c, 'Advance' )), EndDate - $CustomMetadata.LPCR_TypeContrat__mdt.B2B.LPCR_JourAvanceRenouvellement__c , IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Accueil', ISPICKVAL( LPCR_TypeFacturation__c, 'Advance' ), ISPICKVAL( LPCR_TypeCreche__c , 'MICRO')), EndDate - $CustomMetadata.LPCR_TypeContrat__mdt.B2C_MICRO.LPCR_JourAvanceRenouvellement__c , IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Accueil', ISPICKVAL( LPCR_TypeFacturation__c, 'Advance' ), ISPICKVAL( LPCR_TypeCreche__c , 'MAC')), EndDate - $CustomMetadata.LPCR_TypeContrat__mdt.B2C_MAC.LPCR_JourAvanceRenouvellement__c , EndDate ) ) )
CustomField.label: Date de Renouvellement
